name: Clockify
natural_language_description: 这是 Clockify 节点。主要用于: Consume Clockify REST API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: project

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: getAll
available_options: Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many workspaces

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

workspaceId.name: workspaceId
workspaceId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
workspaceId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Workspace Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | 默认值: [] | (必填项)

name.name: name
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Task Name | 作用: Name of task to create | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: consider-duration-format (值: None) - Whether to return the time entry's duration rounded to minutes or seconds based on duration format (hh:mm or hh:mm:ss) from workspace settings
hydrated (值: None) - Whether to return the time entry's project, task and tags in full and not just their IDs

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: customFieldsUi (值: None) - Filter by custom fields
projectId (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
tagIds (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression

projectId.name: projectId
projectId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
projectId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Project Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

tagId.name: tagId
tagId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tag ID | (必填项)

taskId.name: taskId
taskId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Task ID | 作用: ID of task to update | (必填项)

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: name (值: None) - Text to match in the task name

timeEntryId.name: timeEntryId
timeEntryId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Time Entry ID | (必填项)
